title: Frankenstein Captcha
alt: The distinction between a ship and a boat is a line drawn in water.
transcript:
[A captcha design, with a header and four rows of four pictures each below it. The header, in white lettering on a blue background, reads:]
TO CONTINUE, PLEASE CLICK
ALL SQUARES CONTAINING
FRANKENSTEIN[The pictures, all with gray backgrounds, are as follows, from left to right in each row:]Monster: GRRRFrankenstein: It's alive!Girl: Monster![Caption below the panel]:
Oh no.
